mapper.select: SELECT hotel_id,hotel_name,hotel_lng,hotel_lat FROM tb_hotel WHERE status = 0

SELECT room.room_id,room.room_name,room.room_type,room.basic_price AS old_price, MIN(room_date.price) AS todayPrice, IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT room_date.ri_id), 0) room_count FROM tb_room room LEFT JOIN tb_room_info AS room_info ON room_info.room_id = room.room_id LEFT JOIN tb_room_date AS room_date ON room_date.ri_id = room_info.id AND room_date.date BETWEEN #{checkInDate} AND #{checkOutDate} AND room_date.status = 0 WHERE room.hotel_id = #{hotelId} AND room_info.id NOT IN ( SELECT ri_id FROM tb_room_date WHERE date BETWEEN #{checkInDate} AND #{checkOutDate} AND status != 0 ) GROUP BY room.room_id,room.room_name,room.room_type,room.basic_price HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT room_date.date) = DATEDIFF(#{checkOutDate},#{checkInDate}) + 1;

SELECT * FROM tb_room_booking AS room_booking JOIN tb_room_date AS room_date ON room_booking.room_date_id = room_date.id JOIN tb_room_info AS room_info ON room_booking.id = room_date.ri_id JOIN tb_room AS room ON room.room_id = room_info.room_id AND room.hotel_id = #{hotelId}

SELECT user.phone FROM tb_user AS user JOIN tb_room_order AS room_order ON user.user_id = room_order.user_id JOIN tb_room_booking AS room_booking ON room_order.order_id = room_booking.order_id WHERE room_booking.room_date_id = #{roomDateId}
